headline: I also have to be careful with formatting. Each field needs to be enclosed in double quotes, and fields are separated by semicolons. No semicolons inside the fields themselvesâ€”only commas if needed. The first row is the header: "headline"

headline: Breaking News: Major Discovery in Ancient Ruins
author: Dr. Maria Gonzalez
content: In a groundbreaking discovery, archaeologists have unearthed a collection of rare artifacts at the ancient ruins of Machu Picchu. The findings include pottery, jewelry, and tools that date back to the Inca civilization. This discovery is expected to shed new light on the daily lives and customs of the Incan people.
